name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong proficiency in **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and frameworks such as **React**, alongside design tools like **Figma**. I have a proven track record in creating visually appealing, user-friendly interfaces, utilizing tools like **Tailwind**, **Bootstrap**, and **Foundation** to enhance web applications. My experience includes implementing responsive design practices and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams to create optimized **REST APIs** and have hands-on experience with version control systems including **GitHub** and **GitLab**. With a keen understanding of **SEO** practices, I focus on building high-performing web applications that attract and retain users.

In addition, I have demonstrated success in leading projects, enhancing user engagement, and employing agile methodologies to deliver quality solutions on time. My holistic approach blends technical skills with a commitment to user-centric design, evidenced by my ability to integrate both frontend aesthetics and functionality into every project.
